data.name: Intro
data.value: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you use our IoTCloudHomeControl system.

data.name: Section1Body
data.value: We may collect device-related data such as device identifiers, sensor readings, and control actions. This data is stored in a Firebase Realtime Database to support remote control and monitoring.

data.name: Section2Body
data.value: We use your data to operate smart home devices, provide real-time feedback, and improve system performance. We do not sell or share your data.

data.name: Section3Body
data.value: We apply reasonable security measures including Firebase authentication to protect your data.

data.name: Section4Body
data.value: We use Firebase by Google. Review their privacy policy at https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy

data.name: Section5Body
data.value: This policy may be updated. Any changes will be posted here with a new date.
